Articles.Content: When I click a category in the editor the tag glitches to my mouse until I double click on the category and that is not deadly but it drives me NUTS. Plz could someone help

If you can take a moment to please read this sticky. It'll tell you the kind of information we need, where to find it, and how to post it so that we can see what you are seeing.

I think you're talking about those little tool tips? That pop up, like where it says "Exit" when you hover over the Exit button. The other way to get rid of them is to simply hover over the thing that it goes with. So if it says "Engines", hover your mouse back over the engines tab and then away. No need to click.

Yes, it's annoying. Fortunately it's just cosmetic.

If that's not it, then please add a pic or two showing what you're referring to.

Cheers,

~Claw

Oh you mean the tooltop sticks to the mouse? Yeah, there's no fix, sorry, drives me bonkers as well as I have to mouse over the button to remove it.

If you'd like to report this as a bug please see Claws bug report sticky thread for the link to the bug tracker, otherwise post this kind of stuff to Suggestions and Development as that way a developer may see it, this sub-forum is for support by the community for the community, not for bugs, thank you.
